channel.title: Server crashes when adding new NPC drops
channel.description:
I'm using a Delta based server, and whenever I add new items to the drop list for a npc something goes wrong..
Everything goes find when I compile, but when I run the server it just points it all out..
[code]Pwnscape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 04 7608 1 20" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2088) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:595) at server.main(server.java:115) [/code]

item.title: Server crashes when adding new NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

don’t space it out , use tabs.

Read full topic
